Name: blower and heat exchange unit production, KWLC 1200 | blower and heat exchange unit, KWLC 1200 | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2819:Manufacture of other general-purpose machinery
Description: Ventilation unit for decentral ventilation systems with 1200 m3/h maximal air flow. Housing mainly made of galvanised steel insulated with rock wool. Heat recovery element made of aluminium. Total weight of component 170 kg
